languages.text:
Requires Overseer to have Hereticus — 5
Cyber Mastif has +50% Wounds and +250% Damage
Cybermastiff deals +20% damage for each dead enemy and +200% damage for each unconcious ally except other familiars.

traits.locale_text:
Requires Overseer to have Hereticus — 5
Cyber Mastif has +50% Wounds and +250% Damage
Cybermastiff deals +20% damage for each dead enemy and +200% damage for each unconcious ally except other familiars.

languages.text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +250% more damage.
The cyber-mastiff deals +20% more damage for each defeated enemy and +200% for each unconscious allied character.

traits.locale_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +250% more damage.
The cyber-mastiff deals +20% more damage for each defeated enemy and +200% for each unconscious allied character.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +250% more damage.
The cyber-mastiff deals +20% more damage for each defeated enemy and +200% for each unconscious ally.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +250% more damage.
The cyber-mastiff deals +20% more damage for each defeated enemy and +200% for each unconscious allied character.

languages.text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — фанатик
Кибермастиф получает +50% к {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимальному здоровью{/g} и наносит на 250% больше урона.
Также он наносит на 20% больше урона за каждого погибшего врага и на 200% больше урона за каждого союзного персонажа без сознания.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50% and it deals +250% more damage.
The cyber-mastiff deals +20% more damage for each defeated enemy and +200% for each unconscious allied character.

traits.locale_text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — фанатик
{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}Максимальное здоровье{/g} кибермастифа увеличено на 50%, и он наносит на 250% больше урона.
Кибермастиф наносит на 20% больше урона за каждого погибшего врага и на 200% больше урона за каждого дружественного персонажа без сознания.

Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — фанатик
{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}Максимальное здоровье{/g} кибермастифа увеличено на 50%, и он наносит на 250% больше урона.

Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — фанатик
Кибермастиф получает +50% к {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимальному здоровью{/g} и наносит на 250% больше урона.
Также он наносит на 20% больше урона за каждого погибшего врага и на 200% больше урона за каждого союзного персонажа без сознания.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端者{/g} ― 狂信者が必要
サイバーマスチフのg|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}{/g}が+50%上昇し、与えるダメージが+250%増加する。
サイバーマスチフは、倒された敵につき与えるダメージが+20%増加し、気絶した味方につき+200%増加する。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50% and it deals +250% more damage.
The cyber-mastiff deals +20% more damage for each defeated enemy and +200% for each unconscious allied character.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端者{/g} ― 狂信者が必要
サイバーマスチフのg|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}{/g}が+50%上昇し、与えるダメージが+250%増加する。
サイバーマスチフは、倒された敵につき与えるダメージが+20%増加し、気絶した味方につき+200%増加する。

languages.text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} – Eiferer
Die {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Cyber-Mastiffs erhöhen sich um +50 % und er verursacht +250 % mehr Schaden.
Der Cyber-Mastiff verursacht +20 % mehr Schaden für jeden besiegten Gegner und +200 % für jeden bewusstlosen Verbündeten.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +250% more damage.
The cyber-mastiff deals +20% more damage for each defeated enemy and +200% for each unconscious allied character.

traits.locale_text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} – Eiferer
Die {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Cyber-Mastiffs erhöhen sich um +50 % und er verursacht +250 % mehr Schaden.
Der Cyber-Mastiff verursacht +20 % mehr Schaden für jeden besiegten Gegner und +200 % für jeden bewusstlosen Verbündeten.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Kâfirce{/g} — Bağnaz kanaati gerektirir
Siber mastifin {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanı +%50 artar ve iye, +%250 daha fazla hasar verir.
Siber mastif, alt edilen her düşman için +%20 ve baygın düşen her dost karakter için +%200 daha fazla hasar verir.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +250% more damage.
The cyber-mastiff deals +20% more damage for each defeated enemy and +200% for each unconscious allied character.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Kâfirce{/g} — Bağnaz kanaati gerektirir
Siber mastifin {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanı +%50 artar ve iye, +%250 daha fazla hasar verir.
Siber mastif, alt edilen her düşman için +%20 ve baygın düşen her dost karakter için +%200 daha fazla hasar verir.

languages.text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} — Zélote.
Les {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximums{/g} du cyber-mastiff sont augmentées de +50 %, et il inflige +250 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Le cyber-mastiff inflige +20 % de dégâts supplémentaires pour chaque ennemi vaincu et +200 % pour chaque personnage allié inconscient.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +250% more damage.
The cyber-mastiff deals +20% more damage for each defeated enemy and +200% for each unconscious allied character.

traits.locale_text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} — Zélote.
Les {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximums{/g} du cyber-mastiff sont augmentées de +50 %, et il inflige +250 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Le cyber-mastiff inflige +20 % de dégâts supplémentaires pour chaque ennemi vaincu et +200 % pour chaque personnage allié inconscient.

languages.text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Fanático
Las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del cibermastín aumentan en un +50 % e inflige un +250 % de daño adicional.
El cibermastín inflige un +20 % de daño adicional por cada enemigo derrotado y un +200 % por cada personaje aliado que esté inconsciente.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot

traits.locale_text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Fanático
Las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del cibermastín aumentan en un +50 % e inflige un +250 % de daño adicional.
El cibermastín inflige un +20 % de daño adicional por cada enemigo derrotado y un +200 % por cada personaje aliado que esté inconsciente.

languages.text:
需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——狂热者
生化獒犬{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}提高50%，造成的伤害提高250%。
每有一名敌人被消灭，生化獒犬造成的伤害就提高20%；每有一名盟友陷入昏迷，生化獒犬造成的伤害就提高200%。
